TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ApplicationSharingModality extends Microsoft.Lync.Model.Conversation.Modality

Docs.summary: Represents the application sharing modality of a conversation or participant modality collection.

remarks.para: Use the ApplicationSharingModality from a participant modality collection when you want to take some controlling action for that participant on the shared resource. For example, if you want to grant control of a shared resource to a participant, you call BeginGrantControl on that participant modality.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Controller As Participant

Docs.summary: Gets the conversation participant that is in control of the shared resource.

remarks.para: The Controller property returns null when the resource owner is in control of the resource.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ControllerChanged As EventHandler(Of ControllerChangedEventArgs)

Docs.summary: Registered on the Conversation ApplicationSharingModality and raised when the shared resource controller changed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ControlRequestReceived As EventHandler(Of ControlRequestReceivedEventArgs)

Docs.summary: Registered on the Conversation ApplicationSharingModality and raised when someone requests control of a resource.

remarks.para: To accept a control request, call BeginAcceptControlRequest or BeginGrantControl on the ApplicationSharingResource from the requesting participant modalities collection. Do not call these methods on the ApplicationSharingResource from the Conversation.Modalities collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LocalSharedResources As SharingResourceList

Docs.summary: Get the list of resources currently shared by the local participant.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event LocalSharedResourcesChanged As EventHandler(Of LocalSharedResourcesChangedEventArgs)

Docs.summary: Raised when the list of locally shared resources changes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ParticipationState As ParticipationState

Docs.summary: Get the participation state.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ParticipationStateChanged As EventHandler(Of ParticipationStateChangedEventArgs)

Docs.summary: Raised when the participation state has changed.

remarks.para: The participation state change event is raised multiple times when a participant attempts to take a control action on a shared resource. For example, if a user requests control of a shared resource and the control request is granted, the event is rased when the ParticipationState goes from Viewing to RequestingControl. When the request is granted, the event is raised again when the ParticipationState changes to Controlling.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ShareableResources As SharingResourceList

Docs.summary: Get the list of available resources.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Sharer As Participant

Docs.summary: Gets the participant who is sharing. It returns null when nobody is sharing.

Docs.summary: Raised when the sharer changed.
